'''''Vinyar Tengwar 28''''' is the twenty-eighth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|27|29}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "The Host of Gondolin" — Tom Loback
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "The Bodleian Declensions"✫ — Patrick H. Wynne, Christopher Gilson, and Carl F. Hostetter
* "Transitions in Translations: Mismatched German Translations" (column) — Arden R. Smith

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
